cc.moveable_type.piece
Class PieceMovableTypeWen

java.lang.Object
  cc.moveable_type.ChineseCharacterMovableType
      cc.moveable_type.ChineseCharacterMovableTypeWen
          cc.moveable_type.piece.PieceMovableTypeWen
All Implemented Interfaces:
PieceMovableType
public class PieceMovableTypeWen
extends ChineseCharacterMovableTypeWen
implements PieceMovableType

物件活字樹狀結構的葉子。把活字的資訊全部集中在同一個物件上（Piece， RectangularArea型態 ），方便函式傳遞與使用，而且物件上也有相對應操縱的函式。

Author:
Ihc
See Also:
ChineseCharacterMovableTypeWen
